meanings.definition: The act of achieving more than is expected or required.
meanings.sent1: Her overachievements in school made her parents proud.
meanings.sent2: His numerous overachievements at work earned him a promotion.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's overachievements in gathering nuts amused the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The sun's overachievements in providing warmth can never be matched.
meanings.sent5: The student's overachievements shone brightly in the school's hall of fame.

meanings.definition: Someone who achieves more than is expected or required.
meanings.sent1: The overachievements in the office always set a high standard.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the overachievements in her class for her exceptional grades.
meanings.sent3: The overachievements at the party were the first to finish all the snacks.
meanings.sent4: The overachievements in the garden were the tallest sunflowers in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: He was the overachievements in the family, always striving for excellence.
